query: WITH entities AS (SELECT approval_process_id, id FROM credit_facilities WHERE (COALESCE((approval_process_id, id) > ($3, $2), $2 IS NULL)) ORDER BY approval_process_id, id LIMIT $1) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: CreditFacilityId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN credit_facility_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.approval_process_id, i.id, i.id, e.sequence
